forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
